item.description:
PLEASE RSVP YES WITH ONLY ONE MEETUP GROUP
THIS ENSURES AN ACCURATE COUNT

Fellow happy hourer, Biagio, has arranged for another mix and mingle....a joint event of several meetup groups.

Below, I've copied the details from the group for which Biagio organizes.

Kitty OSheas is an awesome spot to host another Mix and Mingle cross Meetup party for 200 members on Friday June 13, 2008!

This is not a Singles party. So anyone can come that means couples are also welcome. Let's get to know one another and socialize.

Location: Kitty OSheas is in Boston (near Faneuil Hall) 131 State St Boston, MA 02109 617-725-0100
Kitty Link

The 2nd floor can hold 200 people. There are 2 Bars upstairs, 4 huge comfy couches, AC, its own DJ area with light machine and dance floor, plus its own bathroom upstairs so we would truly have our own private party.

I have a commitment from Kitty OSheas for 2 Bartenders at the upfront 2nd floor Bar and one Bartender in the back area 2nd floor Bar. I am ordering $150-200 worth of appetizers (Wings/veggie platter, cheeses etc) because their Kitchen is small and we will never get enough food for 200 members. I ask if you eat any of the appetizers to please throw in $5. While this is a completely free event your contribution for the eats is voluntary.

AS ALWAYS YOU MUST MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER

Please join us for all this fun Friday June 13 after work starting at 6:30 pm until closing.

Please note : After 9PM the bar charges a mandatory $10 cover just to get in so we need to make sure members come before 9PM.

After 9PM if we still have over 100 people upstairs we can keep the 2nd floor to ourselves all night.

In other words get there before 9PM so you don't have to pay the cover and we can have the 2nd floor to ourselves.

Meetup Groups are:

New England 25+ Social Fun http://socialnetwork....

Beantown +Beyond 20-40 Something http://singles.meetup...

Metro Boston Active Singles 25-35 http://singles.meetup...

Maybes RSVPs will be moved to a NO RSVPs 1 week before (On June 6) the event with no exception.
There were 140 members at the last Mix and Mingle cross Meetup party. Over 30 members begged to come in but we could not fit them in.

It should be fun and I hope you can all join us for this blast of a party!
Ciao
Biagio
item.how_to_find_us: The whole second floor will be reserved for Meetup members
item.name: Boston Mix + Mingle Part 2 (M&M2)
